Many exporters who take part in trade missions confirm the huge value in being able to share experiences and observations with like-minded people in the export industry.

As well as allowing local exporters to compare notes, Export Forums can also attract high-calibre speakers who can introduce members to new opportunities. We are keen to hear from local exporters who would potentially be interested in participating in regular export networking and information-gathering events.
